name: VT Technology Venture Partners
description: VT Technology Ventures is a boutique investment firm, specializing in supporting great ideas which have resulted in great early and growth stage companies. We believe in sweat equity and support founder teams who have already invested their passion, time and energy to turn their ideas into viable businesses. We are ready to help them accelerate their growth and take the next step. Our main focus are technology companies, especially ones where we can help with our experience in building and scaling B2B software solutions.
